name: School is to Long!
description:
School STARTS at 6:00 and ENDS at 12:00! (6 real time hours)

Speed -up time by completing THE LONG LIST.

Watch out! the INSPECTORS will catch you out of class...

At 12:00 you will receive a SCHOOL GRADE according to how long you take in time and how many activities you complete.


Can you finish the game in less than 2 minutes and complete all the activities?

Game designed for: Your game on trial Jam 2021
